alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Bayfield; Burnett; Douglas; Iron; Price; Sawyer; Washburn (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 04 at 8:58PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...LIGHT SNOW ACCUMULATION CAUSING SLIPPERY STRETCHES ON AREA ROADS... Light snow this evening generally along and south of a line from Bemidji to Hibbing to Silver Bay in Minnesota and over all of northwest Wisconsin has created slippery stretches on area roads. Areas which may experience slippery roads this evening and overnight include the following locations in Minnesota...Walker, Longville, Pine River, Leader, Crosslake, Emily, Brainerd, Deer River, Grand Rapids, McGregor, Aitkin, Dads Corner, Cotton, Floodwood, Alborn, Twig, Duluth, Fredenberg, Cloquet, Moose Lake, Cromwell, Willow River, Sandstone, Hinckley, and Pine City. In Wisconsin areas impacted include Superior, Maple, Solon Springs, Dairyland, Danbury, Siren, Grantsburg, Minong, Trego, Spooner, Port Wing, Cornucopia, Bayfield, Washburn, Iron River, Benoit, Drummond, Cable, Hayward, Radisson, Winter, Ashland, Odanah, Mellen, Clam Lake, Glidden, Park Falls, Phillips, Prentice, Saxon, Hurley, and Mercer. Use caution if traveling tonight and reduce your speed if you encounter snow or ice covered roads.

area.areaDesc: Ashland; Bayfield; Burnett; Douglas; Iron; Price; Sawyer; Washburn
